Text: RE Hi girlsSusan Great idea to initiate the email correspondenceI have a huge exam tomorrow and then I wont have internet access until December nd or so so I just wanted to let you know that an email with more detailed information will be coming your way soon After my test tomorrow Im leaving for the holidaysIm going to meet Carters family the boyfriend youve apparently heard about and then were going skiing with a bunch of friends from med school until the st so Ill email more when I get back It was great to hear from you Love Elizabeth Original Message From As it appears I will be living and breathing the nd floor of the Enron building well through the first of the year Ive decided to break down and try to maintain my friendships via email You all know me well enough to know that this a huge step on my part I am not the worlds best emailer Anyway I feel like Im out of touch with whats going on in your collective lives and am thus missing out on some pretty wonderful exciting and special things So when and if any of you get a chance shoot me back a quick note and let me know whats new in your life Love you guys Susan Jennifer Hope work is going well I know this time of year has got to be crazy for anyone in your line of work but Im sure youre handling it well We really need to go grab coffee dinner a movie or something soon Im in need of a good chat Jessica I know youre in the midst of finals right now and probably about to pull your hair out Just focus on the fact that theyll be over soon and youll be off to London to see Ashley and Lee I am so jealous Please tell Clay I say hello and wish him good luck as well on yalls exams Lisa Hey sweetie I am so sorry I couldnt make it to your shower in SA but Jen said it went really well We need to get together soon Ive missed seeing you and especially hearing about the wedding and all the fun goings ons in your life Tell Brad I say Hi and Ill be glued to the TV set just like him on the on the th rooting on the Horns Emily I really want to hear how your Thanksgiving went with Thomas and the Fam Knowing Thomas it went great and your entire family especially your Mom is absolutely in love with him Keep me posted on your plans for the future Im curious where youre going to end up geographically Also I thought youd find it interesting that I may have an opportunity to work in your old hometown Chicago Any thoughts Elizabeth I have really been out of touch with you and I am very mad at myself for letting that happen Please write back soon and let me know how school your family and this new man in your life okay Im not completely out of touch are all doing My guess is youre going through exams as well right now so Ill wish you the best of luck and infinite success

RE Good morningWell better late than never Original Message From Jennifer Bowles What time is it PM Name that appears on your birth certificate Elizabeth Anne Edrington Nicknames Eddie big surprise there I know Parents names Jack and Janis Number of candles that appeared on your last cake Carter definitely went above and beyond the call of duty on that one Date that you regularly blow them out March Pets none Height Eye Colorblue Piercingone in each ear Hair color brown Tattoosnone and there will not be any EVER How much do you love your job and still a studentit has its ups and downs Hometown Houston Current Residence San Antonio Have you been in love yes finally Currently in love pretty sure Favorite thing about email quick and easy correspondence not to mention a great tool for procrastinating Ever been toilet papered no Loved somebody so much that it made you cry Definitely although Im not so sure it was really love looking backJen put this one perfectly Been in a car crash only as a passenger and very minor at that Croutons or Bacon Bits croutons doors or Coffee or IceCream ice cream sorry Jen I know youre disappointed Blanket or stuffed animal never was that attached to onealthough I did have a little doll named Lolly that I was pretty fond of Best Color green and blue Salad Dressing balsamic vinagrette Socks Color white but only with tennis shoes Book you are reading or hope to read Back to the student thingI cant remember the last time I read a fun bookhowever when I graduate one day Ill especially enjoy it Favorite Movies thats a tough oneSleepless in Seattle Youve Got Mail any romantic comedy really with or without Meg Ryan and Tom Hanks Favorite Foods Mexican just about anything with salsa on top Song Playing at the Moment none Toothpaste Colgate Restaurants too many to list from Austin San AntonioLa Fogata Aldos HoustonIll agree with Mary Rebeccas Brennans suggestion Flower anything tropical in fun bright colors although you can hardly beat a fresh rose Least Favorite Food bananas Favorite Sports to Watch Football on TV and liveHookem Horns Fast Food Restaurant ChickFilA When was your last hospital visit well given that Im a medical student I probably was in the hospital sometime last week Favorite Drink diet coke for weekdays frozen margaritas on the weekends What color is your bedroom carpet beige How many times did you fail your Permit and or Drivers Test NEVER like anyone would actually admit failing Where do you see yourself in years who knowsbut hopefully not in school any more surely Ill have the MD by thenalthough it feels neverending at times Who is the last person that you got email from before opening this one not sure but perhaps Clay or Jessica Have you ever been convicted of a crime no Which single store could you max out your credit card Neimans What do you do most often when you are bored call friendsfamily play piano jog etc What words or phrases do you often hear overused like Friend who lives farthest away Susan in Missouri Most annoying thing VERY slow drivers on the entrance ramp to the freewayyes and especially in San Antonio Best things in the world Gods grace my family and new experiences well stated again Jen Bedtime usually or I really would like to bump that up to about Who will respond to this fastest I think I was the last one to respond so I think Susan got it Who is the person that you sent this to that is least likely to respond Emily I think she pretty much affirmed that one What time is it now PM didnt take so long after all ENJOY Get your FREE download of MSN Explorer at
